BotMessages.InitialMessage:
Please type in /support in order to use me.
Once you are in support mode, you can use /reset to start over.
BotMessages.Block: Please enter your block number. Available block numbers are:
BotMessages.Unit: Please enter your unit number, for example, 112
BotMessages.Category:
Please enter the corrosponding number of your current issue:
1. Electrical related issues
2. Water related issues
3. Painting related issues
4. Walls & Ceilings related issues
5. Carpentry
6. Other
BotMessages.Description:
Please enter a clear description of your issue.

For Example:
Bathroom light not working
BotMessages.Confirm:
Please confirm your entry with the corrosponding number:
1. To confirm
2. To cancel and start again
BotMessages.Final: Your support request has been submitted.
BotMessages.BadInput: Please provide the correct reponse as stated in the examples.
BotMessages.SupportModeNotActive: You are not in support mode. Please type in /support to log a fault.
BotMessages.SupportFooter: Once you are in support mode, you can use /reset to start over.
